original_text: As they went on their way through the cities, they delivered to them for observance the decisions that had been reached by the apostles and elders who were in Jerusalem.
korean_text: 여러 성으로 다녀 갈 때에 예루살렘에 있는 사도와 장로들이 작정한 규례를 그들에게 주어 지키게 하니

sentences.original_text: As they went on their way through the cities
they delivered to them for observance the decisions
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 그들에게 지키도록 결정 사항들을 전달했고

sentences.original_text: that had been reached by the apostles and elders
sentences.korean_translation: 그 결정들은 사도와 장로들이 내린 것들이었고
